reviews.title: CANAM Limo cheats its drivers!
text: CANAM Limo cheats its drivers!
Canam Limo is airport taxi and limo service which is based in Burlington, ON.
Canam Limo cheats their drivers, when I found out and told them they created a story and fired me without any reason, hold my money for months and at the end did not give me my money.

I heard this Canam Limo Company cheating its drivers and two of their drivers, I think they left too, told me that they charged client amount of a money but they would not a driver's share exactly. Or let say cheats their drivers. It was hard for me to believe this, but during my work I found out from the two clients talk that this is a true issue: One time I was driving a client to Buffalo Airport and the other one to Pearson airport. When I told them they owner was upset and got angry and told me that they have a third party that work with them. This claim was not true simply. I have all discussions with those clients with their names, phone numbers and emails, but I am keeping it as a respect of privacy of those clients.

One day, 8 months ago, they told me to pick up one of their cars which is parked front of a mechanic shop in Burlington called (‚Ä¶) it was noon and I had a plan to go to pick up one person from Toronto Pearson airport. When I grab a key from mechanic office and I started the car to go I drove the car straight as supposed to be, but I heard scratched voice of a car. I come out and I see the Ford scratched with another small red BMW car. Right away I took several pictures and I sent to the company and I explained that I drove straight but how this happened I do not know. Even I asked them to review the mechanic‚Äôs camera that was not my fault. I took several pictures which showed my started driving was perfect. At the same moment I took several pictures from all side just to make sure was not my fault.

I did not leave the place of the issue and I talked to the owner that was not my fault due to these points, pictures and also video. He told me go for work now and will talk later. I worked regularly more than three weeks. After that they have not sent me any run and I was thinking what was happened. After that I realized the owner send me to work for several weeks just to hijack more money that I work for him. I called them to calculate my runs and give me my money. A financial person calculated my money but one month weeks and months passed nothing happened and I keep emailing and calling where is my money. I knew something happened and they do not send me any ride. After 5 months, I got a call from the owner that he will not give my money because he fixed the scratched car. Even he threatened me that if I ask for it next time he will take my driver license info to some places which is I do not know what is this. I explained to him that this was not my fault and he can check the video and also he has the photos. From his speech I found out this was a trap from him just to fire me and also keep my money, because he was very upset when I asked about the differences of amount of charging clients and the different payment to his drivers. When I requested to meet few weeks ago front of his house he expressed this angriness about asking this issue and he said you do not have right to ask about how we charge clients and how we pay you. I was talking to him in a friendly and quiet way that I would appreciate it if he could give me my money but he refused and got angry. I knew it the act of angriness indicate of something that you are not right.

reviews.title: NEVER USE BECK TAXI
text: My daughter and I got into a Beck taxi that was in queue outside the Princess of Wales theatre around 10:30pm after a show.  Requested a ride back to the Distillery district. When I went to pay with my debit card, the driver took the card from me, swiped and then inserted it into his machine and then handed me the machine to complete the transaction.  I entered my pin and when the transaction was confirmed, removed my card and exited the cab.  I thought everything was fine.I went grocery shopping the next morning and when I went to pay with my debit card it kept telling me my pin was wrong and I was unable to pay.  I went to my bank where I discovered that the debit card I had was not mine at all.  The cab driver had switched cards on me and had then withdrawn $950 from my account because he had my PIN number from his "machine".  The bank told me that Beck Taxi is notorious for fraud schemes and this is a common problem.  DO NOT Ever use Beck Taxi, they are crooks.

reviews.title: BAD BAD BAD DRIVER- Driver Number 00986
text: I ordered a beck taxi from ScotiabankArena to town inn suites. About 12/13 min drive.
Waited for the taxi to arrive and when it did the man said my name and I went over.
He said to me when I got in the car ‚Äúno meter now. You pay me 55, no less‚Äù I managed to get him down to 40.
He said ‚ÄúI want money before we start trip, I don‚Äôt move otherwise‚Äù so i reluctantly gave him the 40 dollars.

We set off on the journey and the whole way he kept looking in the mirror at me saying ‚Äúyou see this üí© , 40 dollars and I have to drive in this üí© , you English people don‚Äôt know what it‚Äôs like‚Äù
I ignored the constant abusive words and comments.
We arrived at my hotel about 18/19 mins later, so really only a 6 min delay at worst. As I was about to get out he locks the door and said ‚Äú you give me 10 or 15 dollar tip‚Äù
I explained to him I am a solo traveler and I don‚Äôt have much money remaining. He then proceeded to just sit there staring aimlessly out the drivers window .

10 mins past and I said to him I need to go as I am leaving in the morning and have to pack. He turned round and said ‚Äúnext time you tip or you don‚Äôt get out‚Äù then he unlocked my door and I went into the hotel lobby
I spoke to the concierge and he said I was ripped off. The max they should‚Äôve charged, including a tip, should‚Äôve been 30 dollars
A really bad experience that put a real dampener on my time here in Toronto
I tried to contact beck themselves but no one answered.
For future reference his number on the back of the seat was 00986
A old ish man I‚Äôd say late 40‚Äôs early 50‚Äôs , Asian and very rude.
It‚Äôs a real shame

reviews.title: Never again
text: Rude driver.  I said hello getting in the vehicle, he was silent. I got the street name wrong initially, my fault, but he got really angry with me when I corrected it.  I did not feel safe.

reviews.title: Abandoned and Freezing (roughly 8pm)
text: I called Beck to pick me up and was told there was a Taxi availible just around the corner, after 10 mins went by I got an automated call that my Taxi was delayed
After another 10mins I called to ask what was up and was told sometimes it can take an average of 20mins for a cab to arrive so should be there soon
I waited for another FORTY minutes so a total on 1hr. I called and was told 20-60 minutes is normal.
At this point despite wearing gloves, a winter, a hoody and a coat I was getting quite cold so after conidering for a few minutes I canceled my and ordered an Uber
The Uber showed up in TWO minutes and cost half as much as the taxi was estimated to be...I opted to tip that guy the difference since he was extremely friendly and helpful (i had some boxes with me)
Now I remember why I stopped using Taxi's, THIS is why Uber is beating you, not because they cheated or its unfair its because you SUCK!!
Note that every time I called Beck I was told and treated like I was being unreasonable even after an HOUR!!!

reviews.title: Fantastic
text: A cab service with timely and metered service. They do have a few wheelchair accessible cars that offer a rear loading ramp. It is the same mtered service at the same rates as non wheelchair customers.
The drivers were friendly, professional and courteous. Basically, I called numerous times, a half dozen or more, and ordered an accessible cab, and 15 to 20 minutes later, it arrived.
The rates were very reasonable. I paid in Canadian dollars, but they do accept USD, but they do not convert, so it's better to pay in Canadian dollars.

reviews.title: Worst Experience Ever in Cab!
text: Worst cab driver ever!
At Wineva and Queen. Driver couldn't find Main St and Kingston Rd !!!
Never order Beck Taxi !@@

reviews.title: Gratitude
text: My name is Aldo Colangelo. I'm a 96- old man, a CNIB member and I'm a little bit deaf as well. Yesterday, at noon,  and at about 6.00 p.m., I called your central station. The first driver, from Ghana, took me to Stephen st,, Etobicoke and gladly put my wheelchair in the back of his car, I was VERY happy with his joviality and professional help,.
The second driver, at 6.00 p.m. was as good and efficient as the first and took me home, at Argyle selecting the Queensway route to avoid traffic jams. I was extremely pleased, once again.

'Our family has been very fortunate to be served the way your central station staff & drivers have been with us. Please, tell them that as a very, very old man, I am grateful to all of them and your driver team. God bless you amd your families.

reviews.title: Now THAT‚ÄôS customer service!
text: I deleted an earlier 1-star review because of the subsequent customer service from Beck Taxi.

On July 2/23, we pre-ordered a cab to take us to a wedding (we were dressed in fine clothes). Driver showed up with his 2 kids in the car, expecting us to get in, so we told him to leave and we found another ride. My credit card was subsequently charged a $10 tip. I immediately complained to Beck via their website. Two days later, Beck emailed me, shared my opinion of the driver‚Äôs atrocious service, reversed the tip and offered to send me coupons for a free ride.
THAT‚ÄôS how a company changes the perception of poor customer service to fantastic customer service.  Well done Beck! You‚Äôre still my preferred company of transportation!

reviews.title: terrible and disgusting
text: Filthy car and trunk. The seats were peeling terribly and the trunk was filled with rags where our bags were put. Could not sit back against the seats or breath in the car.

reviews.title: The best experience
text: I want to say thank you for having hired people like Ahmed, taxi number 1819. He is the most smart, fun, caring and well behaved person that you'll want to drive you. I want to say "Happy New Year" to you and, if you can, send to him my best regards. Anca.

reviews.title: Annoying
text: Apparently the cab drivers like to call you before they arrive at your pickup point to make sure you are standing right there.  Personally I don't like answering the phone so the cab driver can make sure I'm at the curb.  I understand if they drive up and no one is there, but give us at least 30 sec. For this reason and many others I'm switching to Uber.

reviews.title: Great experience
text: I had to take two Beck taxis today, and I had a great experience with both. I use a walking stick and the second driver made sure that I was ok after I dropped it while getting out! He offered to help even though I told him I was ok. Will definitely use them next time I‚Äôm in Toronto!

reviews.title: Tried to take a taxi!
text: Do not use this taxi company if you have a service  dog!  They refused to pick up a family member,  his wife and son from the Keg Mansion after a family get together.
No explanation was given to them, no call back from the company!
If only they had been able to get the license number!  Very upsetting!
We will never use Beck Taxi again!

reviews.title: Refused service to a disabled young woman because the destination was too close
text: I was staying at the Weston Waterfront and have bad arthritis. I tried to get a cab to the train station and three of your cabs refused to take me because it was too close. Your cabs refused service to a disabled young woman with a suitcase and told me to walk.  You cant tell by looking at me that I walk with difficulty and when I tried to explain this they said I had to go to the next one in line.  I will be reporting this to the Taxi Commission and the Weston.  Your cab drivers are despicable. I almost missed my train.

reviews.title: Drives away while still putting baby in the car.
text: Driver started driving away while I was still putting my baby in the car seat (I was standing outside the car with the door open). No apologies, he actually just said "some people." Then drove the wrong way, then was speeding down the highway. I was terrified he was drunk or something and we'd crash. Would have made him stop if we'd been anywhere but a highway. He didn't care that I was in tears in the back seat and only slowed down when my husband told him to. Never using Beck ever again.

reviews.title: Bad service
text: Very bad driver, he doesn‚Äôt know the area, no map, no google, no Siri, I have to turn on my own google map for him. Makes my day worse.

reviews.title: ubiquitous but if you have other options take them
text: Knowing one's rights as a passenger here is paramount. They can't refuse a fare for being "too short" a distance, or for things like strollers, walkers, assistive devices, and it's best to get IN the cab and state the destination. And you are allowed to use debit or credit even if they "claim" the reader's broken, it usually isn't, but they've also used the most bottom feeder readers too. Cash is better in this one instance. I've taken cabs in well over 30 cities including Beijing and Beck, for service is just the spottiest for reliability. You'll get there mostly in one piece but they take a very creative view of traffic laws and physics.
( ride sharing has proven better and more comfortable. as are the fewer other cabs. so I don't really recommend the orange and green livery, unless you just have no option or aren't going far.)

reviews.title: Inconsiderate driver for elderly lady
text: I was desperate to hire a cab to get my mother to her doctor's appt. Both the dispatcher and the driver called me to say the cab was here. I live in another country. No good calling me you idiots. The driver said he would call her, he didn't. The superintendent called her as she noticed the cab waiting. He was driving away by the time she arrived downstairs.

And get this......... he didn't help her get into the cab, she's 88, hello?????????? And the worst part, he parked in front of a snow bank and DID NOT offer any help. She had to climb over the snow herself, no cane, no walker. I'm so disgusted with this driver. Ignorant and unprofessional. NEVER AGAIN! STAY AWAY.
I will be writing someone in that company a letter. Can you imagine if she fell and broke something? I cry inside every time I picture her struggling over that snow bank.

reviews.title: Not good.
text: I used their service three times a week ago two of the three drivers were not professional. First the taxi smelled BO . Second my ride was 12$ I gave the driver a 20 and demanded 5$ back pretty reasonable thing and he gave me back 3$. I was in the hurry didn't have time to argue awful service just avoid them at all means. I can recommend using them only if you have exact change . As a tourist this made me a bad impression of Toronto .

reviews.title: Scammed debit card emptied account.
text: Do not use these guys.   If u have no choice pay cash and take a pic of the license plate.  They switched my debit card and wiped out my bank account.  Was having issues with debit machine which they plan then when they assist you they switch cards.  Very smooth operation and an hour later your bank is empty and they deposit blanks and with draw more.  Stick with Uber .  So sad where society has gone.  Called and reported to Beck supervisors and they didn‚Äôt really care.

reviews.title: Using F word to a customer is fine with Beck Taxi
text: I've been a 3-4 years Beck Taxi customer, I usually take a short trip, about 7.5-8$ nearly every day. On October 26, I took my usual trip on Cab # 2241. When we arrived on the right side of the street, I asked him to make a U-turn because he was way passed the location. He replied that "I cannot make a U-turn, police will give me a ticket for that." I asked him again: "Why can't you make a U-turn?". He repeated, this time with a louder voice. I asked him one more time then he yelled at me, saying "Get the f*** out of my car!". I called the company to complain, one customer service representative (CSR) filled the report file and told me that a supervisor will look into that and call me back. No one called me back up till now, when I had to call them again. This time a different CSR said that the driver said the different thing, so they don't have any evidence to do anything about it, so I asked to speak with their supervisor. The supervisor again said the same thing, so I asked her what the driver said. She said that the driver stated that he didn't yell or use the F word to me, and that "I had a beer" before getting into the cab, so they would just drop it off because they don't actually care about their customers.

reviews.title: Incompetent staff and no show
text: Book a trip to go from a retirement home to a hospital for a senior. Request a a vehicle capable of a wheel car access. Call two days prior and receive a confirmation number for the booking and rate as they had the exact address for the trip. On he day of pick up no show - call their dispatch as ask where is the driver as we had a doctors appointment at the hospital. He look it up and clam thee was mistake with the booking as they do not service outside of the City of Toronto. Explain we had 45 minutes to get to appointment and how can they help. Very causally suggest they can provide some phone numbers to try. Ask if they can arrange something and was advise they will call us back in a few minutes. Did call in 10 minutes and again offer two phone numbers we can try. Believe nothing happen for 10 minutes or maybe had a coffee and a good chuckle as to how they cause another panic situation for someone. Incompetence would describe them in a very polite manner. Uber and Lyft can say thank you to Beck for their popular rise in business.
Recommendation - call anyone except Beck
I would rate them as a negative star but the minimum is one star unfortunately. :-(...

reviews.title: Nerves!
text: Beck Taxi have been operating in Toronto for some time; they are identifiable by their pumpkin orange cars.  Travelling in a Beck taxi is something like playing roulette --- you may get to your destination, and you may not.  Many of the drivers are new to Toronto, or seem to be.  One wonders, alarmed, where they learned to drive.  Any available space is fair target for an automobile, and lane changing happens constantly, often at the peril of the neighbouring car(s) or, worse, a law-abiding cyclist. Knowledge of the geography of Toronto is scant. I took a taxi from Union station to York University late in the evening. The driver, to his credit, admitted he did not know the route, so I said I would give easy directions. We ended very near the airport in Mississauga, and I lowered his tip to the minimum. He was furious. York is not a major decision but Yorkdale Mall is, and the same obtained.  In London UK, drivers must pass a rigorious exam of knowledge of the city.  In many years of visiting that city, I can recall only three times when the drivers used a city atlas, even for tiny streets behind streets.  One urges Beck, and other taxi companies, to monitor their drivers very carefully.  A licence from Nation X does not imply that the driver can cope with Canadian urban traffic.  I want to get to heaven in a sweet chariot, not in a dangerous, haphazardly driven cab.

reviews.title: Cruelest individuals I have ever met
text: As somebody who has travelled to 20+ countries in the world, this is by far the worst taxi company in the world. I was attacked by a taxi driver, who pushed me down. He was about to punch me into submission if it weren't for some bystanders who noticed the violence. I called the taxi company and they did not care. The employees for this cab company, from the call centre to the drivers are the worst, most unprofessional, and cruelest individuals I have encountered in my life. Naturally, I ended up calling the police, only to find the cab company was trying their best to obstruct justice.

reviews.title: Unreliable taxi company which cannot complete its pre-booked orders
text: We pre-booked a cab with this company as we have an 18 month old baby and we wanted to leave a wedding venue at a specific time. I rang them at the agreed pick-up time to let them know we were waiting outside the venue. They said that they had to ‚Äúfarm out‚Äù the order to another company as ‚Äúthings had gotten busy‚Äù and offered to give me the number of the other cab company. This completely negates the point of pre-booking a cab. They should not accept pre-booked orders which they cannot deliver on.

They said that someone should be with us within 10 minutes. 10 minutes later no one had arrived so I rang back Beck telling them that this level of service was unsatisfactory, particularly in view of the fact that we had a young child with us and that I had pre- booked with them. They promptly hung up on me which is not only extremely rude but also shows a poor level of regard for customer service.

When I rang back a third time, 20 minutes after the booked pick-up time, another call operator offered to ring the second company for me while I stayed on the line and a cab for a ‚Äúfarmed out‚Äù company turned up, however I am disgusted by Beck‚Äôs poor level of customer service and the fact that they hung up on me shows that they have no regard whatsoever for the customer, especially those who have pre-booked orders and have young children to consider.
I will never book a cab with this company again - they are completely unreliable, rude and can not fulfil even their pre-booked orders.

reviews.title: Smelly Dirty Cars
text: I take Beck taxis often because there are a lot of them in Toronto. I don't remember ever having boarded one that didn't have a BO smell. Dirty hair, unwashed body, quite gross. Some are worse than others. One was so bad, it almost made my friend and I sick. We didn't have time to change cabs so we opened the windows (in winter) and sat on the edge of the seat, trying not to touch anything. Beck taxis are always very dirty. They don't seem to ever get cleaned. I'm not an advocate of disinfectant (makes bacteria stronger, wash your hands instead), but I think I will carry a pair of latex gloves for when I take a taxi. Imagine the germs on that sticky oily credit card terminal! Then you use your phone and put it against your cheek! Au secours!!!!

reviews.title: Great Service
text: What a super taxi company and great friendly drivers!  We didn‚Äôt have to worry about the taxi arriving when we had arranged and even without prearrangements we only had to wait 5 minutes. One driver was especially special, my granddaughter was heading for an important audition and asked me if I had an apple she could eat before the audition time, I said I didn‚Äôt. Well the driver opened his lunch bag and gave her his apple, then offered her his banana & his sandwich!!  How special and caring!  We won‚Äôt use any other company than this one from now on. Call the orange & green taxi company!!

reviews.title: finally have gave up   use Uber
text: i travel all over the world -  lost of big cities -   have resisted using UBER , i give up on Beck Taxi   , cabbies pretend to not know where going , they long run you , pretend to not speak english and run up the fares .  I've had enough of toronto cabs   im now using uber in Toronto

reviews.title: What flat rate??
text: Took the taxi from YYZ to a downtown hotel assuming they would charge the flat rate of $56 per ride as promoted on the website. There were 3 of us and 3 small carryon bags so it was not an extra burden. Driver was not that friendly and didn't help my 97 year old father in law at all. Got charged $70 for the ride when we arrived and said that is the rate. Well talk about taking advantage of people. We took a private limo ride on the return leg and it was only $60.

reviews.title: Unbelivable
text: The driver charged the passengers even though it was a pre-paid service. On top of that, the card we used to pre-pay was compromised.

reviews.title: Terrible policy
text: Apparently they only accept cash fares.  In desperate times their dispatch explained to us, ‚Äúif you have cash we will come, if not we will not‚Äù. I will never use a Beck Taxi again

reviews.title: Terrible experience with Call Centre
text: The driver himself wasn't terrible aside from complaining about me using debit but whatever, at least I got home. My complaint is about one of the call service representatives. He called me when I was trying to get home after work since the TTC wasn't running properly and when I was trying to explain exactly where I was standing he was very condescending to me and when I tried saying where I'm standing across from as I'm not the greatest with directions he kept interrupting me. I wish I knew how to complain to his manager and knew his name because they lost a customer thanks to him.

reviews.title: A Credit to Becks
text: Today we were taken from our condo in North York to our Hotel near Pearson Airport. Mohammed with a taxi van answered Becks needs for us and he was BRILLIANT!

He helped me  with our 4 Heavy suitcases and REALLY helped my husband into his seat and adjusted his own, twice. He went above and beyond. Mohammad Ibrihim A291 ! Dry humoured and wonderful to be with. I CANNOT praise him enough. We were both delighted we got the chance to meet this lovely guy. Hazel and Michael

reviews.title: Inhumane treatment
text: Horrible driver! I'm disabled, in a wheelchair. I requested for a wheelchair accessible cab from beck. When the driver arrived he did not even bother to park on the right side of the street where I was located. The driver roughly loaded me on the ramp. He jarred my leg and caused pain. He should be fired! I'd give this company no stars if I could. This company hires drivers who does not care about their passengers. Even worse, he did this in front of my kids and he was even yelling at my kids!

reviews.title: Beck not guaranteeing taxi will ever arrive
text: Last time I booked ahead for a Beck taxi in Toronto it never arrived. When I called in to check, they could not guarantee if or when it would arrive.  I tried again today for a pickup a few days from now, and they would not guarantee it would arrive. If it came, said it could be from 15-45 minutes late! Anyone know a reliable taxi company in Toronto?

reviews.title: sneaky, surprise $1 debit usage surcharge
text: $1 surprise surcharge if you want to pay with debit.  that's uncommon, and they don't tell you about the surcharge so it feels sneaky and dishonest.

reviews.title: Disgusting
text: The driver called me a bastard because I used my debit card to pay. The Indian drivers are racists. YES they are!!

reviews.title: switch debit card scam/ bank account cleaned out
text: This weekend a  friend and I took a taxi for a short duration around King St W. I used my debit card to pay and when I checked online banking the next day,  ALL of my accounts were wiped clean. No money left.

The taxi driver stole my pin and debit card when I made the transaction and gave me back a fake card. When I called the company to make a report, the said they have no recourse in terms of finding who was working that night. Additionally, Beck taxi drivers are able to turn off their GPS when they want, making it incredibly easy to get away with all manner of illegal behaviour should they so choose - including things far far worse. I am disgusted by the lack of care given by this company, and quite frankly, shocked by just how dangerous it could be to get into one of these cabs given the company accepts zero responsibility on behalf of their employees.
I intend on taking this to the media and pursing my claim to the fullest extent of the law.
Please BOYCOTT. You do not want this to happen to you.

reviews.title: Crooks
text: On July 3rd, 2020 I had to take a cab home because I had too much too drink on an outting.  The driver took my phone because I was quite the mess. He was suppose to return to my house to obtain payment and give me back my phone. He's a no show. I have called Beck several times without action. He did not give me his contact information. Obviously my phone was worth more than the cab ride.
